structure.unit: Telephone And Telegraph Companies, And Lines For The Transmission Of Electricity

law.catch_line: Issue Of Stock Or Scrip Before Payment For Shares At Par
law.text: No such company established under the laws of this commonwealth shall declare any stock or scrip dividend or divide the proceeds of the sale of stock or scrip among its stockholders; nor shall any such company issue any share of stock to any person unless the par value of the shares so issued is first paid in cash to its treasurer.
